dc_title_s: Nova Evropae descriptio; Auctore I. Hondio.; Nova Europae Descriptio;Nova Europa Descriptio
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Border includes examples of local costume and views of cities. Illustrations include a decorative cartouche with children with tools, ships on the ocean, and bears and lions in Russia and Africa. From "Atlantis Maioris Appendix", Johannes Janssonius, 1630. 1 map; 37 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629, cartographer.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix 1630.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
